sentences.en: The bombing was in revenge for the assassination.
sentences.cn: 爆炸事件是对暗杀行为的报复。

sentences.en: The president survived a number of assassination attempts.
sentences.cn: 总统在数次暗杀企图中幸免于难。

sentences.en: The assassination of the president precipitated the country into war.
sentences.cn: 总统被暗杀使国家骤然陷入战争状态。
